A sermon preacht at the funerall of the Lady Mary Villiers, eldest daughter of the Right Hon[ora]ble Christopher Earle of Anglesey who dyed the xxi. of Ianuary 1625. at Horningold in Leicester shire, and was buried the xxiiij. at Goadeby in the Sepulchres of her ancestors / preacht by George Iay ... Jay, George.
[6], 48 p.
Printed for Thomas Harper, London : 1626.
Signatures: A⁴(-A1) B-D⁸. Reproduction of original in the Trinity College (University of Cambridge). Library.
=======
